channel.title: Looking for a good coder
channel.description: Need a good coder to make the inside of mage arena wen u pull the lever for mods and admins only anda tele command to get there. PLz reply if u can do this with no errors!?!? ;D ;D

item.title: Looking for a good coder
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Edit: After reading it again, I am not sure if this is what you wanted, but whatever…

I’m not positive, but I think that you need a code like this:

in voids:

public void pullLever () { if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; } if(playerRights <= 0) { sendMessage("Sorry... you need to be a moderator or administrator to do this."); }
The x’s are coordinates.

In the ObjectUsed area:

if(ObjectUsed(xxxx)){ pullLever(); }
The x’s are the lever’s object ID.

In commands:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("magearena") { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; }
The x’s are coordinates.

That is all off the top of my head though, so I doubt it will actually work.

-Alexia

Read full topic
